name: Dark and Bright
description: Enjoy a different type of Indie-RPG! Grouchweasel is about to get lost in a place that combines reality and dream. What is this world and how did he get here? Can you help him overcome an abstract world that is on the edge of reality?
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit) Processor: Intel速 Pentium速 4 2.0 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution Storage: 240 MB available space
